mapper.select: SELECT T.id, T.book_name, T.author, T.publisher, T.year, T.isbn, T.file_url AS bookFileUrl, T.rate, COUNT(bs.book_id) FROM (SELECT B.ID AS id, BOOK_NAME, AUTHOR, PUBLISHER, YEAR, ISBN, FILE_URL, AVG(RATE) AS rate FROM BOOK B, BOOK_SHELVES BS WHERE B.ID = BS.BOOK_ID AND BOOK_NAME LIKE '${bookName}%' GROUP BY B.ID) AS T, (SELECT bs.book_id FROM book_shelves bs WHERE bs.user_id = #{userId} AND bs.is_read = #{isRead}) AS T2, book_shelves bs WHERE T.id = T2.book_id AND bs.is_read = 1 AND bs.book_id = T.id GROUP BY bs.book_id ORDER BY T.rate DESC
SELECT COUNT(bs.is_read) AS cnt, is_read AS isRead FROM book_shelves bs WHERE bs.user_id = #{userId} GROUP BY bs.is_read ORDER BY bs.is_read DESC
SELECT distinct b.id AS id, file_url AS bookFileUrl FROM top_book t, book b WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND t.book_id = b.id
select count(*) from book_shelves where book_id = #{bookId} AND user_id = #{userId} AND is_read = 1
mapper.delete: delete from top_book where user_id = #{userId} and book_id = #{bookId}
